content: this is a pattern i whipped up for a belt bag decorated with vines that i made up to use up some scrap yarn because of this i have absolutely no idea how many grams or yards of yarn i used to make this but for the main yarn for the bag i used a worsted weight 4 yarn and a 4 5 mm hook for the accent yarn i used for the vines i used a bulky weight yarn and a 6 mm hook you will also need a button mine was a 1-inch diameter one or you could also use a toggle and of course you ll need a belt to put it on
